cause.description:
The Children's Right's Council is an international non-profit organization with 50 chapters in 39 different states and eight different countries. The CRC is dedicated to helping children in promotiing family formation, mediation, shared parenting, parent education, and mitigating the effects of divorce and relationship breakups of children and parents.
1. The CRC believes in connecting children to their non-custodial parents.
2. "The hope of a secure and livable world lies with disciplined nonconformists who are dedicated to justice, peace, and brotherhood."
cause.mission: nurture, love, protect, and educate children and their parents from divorced families.
cause.name: Children's Rights Council
